no-permission: ❌You don't have permission to use this command, you need **ADMINISTRATOR** rights.
settings: Please head to our web-dashboard to change your settings: **https://stoptheresellers.com/dashboard/

bans.joinedblacklisted: User joined the server & is blacklisted

alt.newacckick: This account is only **{days} day(s)** old. This user got kicked.
alt.newacclog: User joined with a new account created at {created} and this server requires a minimum of {mindays} day(s) account age.
alt.newacc: This account is only {days} day(s) old.

checking.nouser: ❌Can't find that user. Please @ a valid user or check by his id.

report.dashboardonly: Reports can be sent from the web dashboard: {url}
report.success: ✅Thanks for reporting, the report will be reviewed soon.

fetch.role-above: This person is a admin / have a role above me
fetch.no-permission: I don't have permission to ban people

help.checkuser: Checks if a user is blacklisted
help.fetch: Fetches your discord and checking if you have any blacklisted people inthere **[BOT ADMINS ONLY]**
help.userinfo: Shows info about the mentioned users discord account.
help.languages: Shows a list with all the current supported languages
help.allow: Allows a blacklisted user to bypass autoban and join your server.
help.allowalt: Allows a user with a new account to bypass alt identification and join your server.
help.id: Provides basic information about the user as name and profile picture.
help.crosscheck: Searches through your server and gives you a list of each blacklisted user with their blacklist reason.
help.invite: Sends a invite link for the bot.
help.supportserver: Sends a invite to the support server.
help.vote: Sends a link where you can vote for the bot.
help.dailyblacklists: Returns the amount of blacklists done in the past 24 hours.
help.leaderboard: Shows the users with most accepted reports
help.report: Returns the website reports should be sent on
help.staffs: Shows a list of STR admins
help.reportscamurl: Report a scam url to be blacklisted

logs.no-logs: ❌You don't have logs enabled in this guild.

verification.inleaking: ⚠️ <@{args}> Successfully verified and **is in the following leaking servers**
verification.noleaking: ✅ <@{args}> Successfully verified and is not in any leaking servers.
verification.forceverify: {author} from {guild.name} wants you to verify yourself. Do it with this link http://stoptheresellers.xyz/auth/verify
verification.autoverify: Welcome to {guild.name}. In order to stay in the server you need to verify yourself with this link http://stoptheresellers.xyz/auth/verify.
verification.kick-msg: User did not verify the force verification made by {author}
verification.no-kick-permission: ❌User did not verify and i **can't** kick because of no kick permission.

userinfo.no-user: ❌Did not find a user with that id. Are you sure that the user is in this server?
userinfo.no-user2: ❌Could not find a user with that id.

crosscheck.success: ✅Loading... I will dm you with a list of blacklisted users in your server in 10 seconds.
crosscheck.error: ❌Something went wrong, could not send the list.
crosscheck.no-dm: ❌I can't dm you, do you have your dms set to friends only?
crosscheck.cooldown: ❌You can only use this command once per 24 hours.
crosscheck.none-found: No blacklisted users found while crosschecking

languages.contribute: Do you want to contribute and add more languages? Do it here

vote.title: Please vote for our bot here.

allowed.userallowed2: {user} Allowed a blacklisted user to be in the server
allowed.error: The user you are trying to allow is not blacklisted

viewreport.no-args: Didn't provide any report to view

allowalt.no-args: ❌Please submit a user id / mention someone.
allowalt.success: Successfully allowed alt account <@{userid}> to be in the server.

urlblacklisted.log-msg:
User posted a blacklisted URL containing the word: **{word}**

**Full message:** *{msg}*

autorole.role-above: The desired role is above mine, move my role above the role you want them to have
autorole.success: User is blacklisted and was given the blacklisted role
